comment._content: So how were these taken...I thought there wasn't such thing as colour photography in those days?? :S Or was it all edited in the darkroom with tinting etc? Looks amazing x

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Hi dianadramaqueen, These are hand-painted lantern slides, so they were painted after the slides were created. Deb talks about this a little more in this video. Shelley, Chief of Technology, Brooklyn Museum
